import React from 'react'; import './Home.css'; import './Content.css'; import lockscreen from '../assets/Proximity-UI/lockscreen.mov'; import article from '../assets/Proximity-UI/article.mov'; const Home = () => { return (

UX/UI Design

Tia - Royal Bank of Canada

{/*
*/}
Tia is a guided AI-based tech support tool that helps all RBC employees resolve common technology issues.

The Problem

The current chat interface is confusing and difficult to understand, ineffective in improving how users experience Tia.

The Solution

Built a chat design that focuses on increasing user retension, trust, and helps all employee understand how to use Tia, to better assist with employee technology issues.

); }; export default Home;
